REACT_APP_API_URL.description: Base URL of the Influence API server, does not include trailing slash

REACT_APP_IMAGES_URL.description: Base URL of the Influence images server, does not include trailing slash

REACT_APP_OPEN_SEA_URL.description: Base URL for OpenSea. Does not include trailing slash

REACT_APP_ETHERSCAN_URL.description: Base URL for Etherscan. Does not include trailing slash

REACT_APP_ETH_PROVIDER.description: Base websocket URL for Infura (or potentially Alchemy). Does not include trailing slash

REACT_APP_CHAIN_ID.description: Chain ID for appropriate chain (1 = Mainnet, 4 = Rinkeby, 5 = Goerli, 1337 = ganache)
